summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Turkish link shortening service (LinkShortTR). All major functionality tested including authentication, link management, analytics, admin panel, and redirect functionality. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% test pass rate. Frontend UI fully functional with Turkish interface, proper navigation, and all interactive elements working.
passed_tests: User registration with new account creation
Link creation with custom slugs and titles
Landing page loading with Turkish content
Login page navigation and form functionality
Link creation dialog and form submission
Link menu and analytics page navigation
Admin panel access and user management
